Serialized Form

  • Package distedit

    • Class distedit.DistributedTextEditor extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • area1

          javax.swing.JTextArea area1

        • area2

          javax.swing.JTextArea area2

        • ipaddress

          javax.swing.JTextField ipaddress

        • portNumber

          javax.swing.JTextField portNumber

        • eventReplayer

          EventReplayer eventReplayer

        • eventReplayerThread

          java.lang.Thread eventReplayerThread

        • dialog

          javax.swing.JFileChooser dialog

        • currentFile

          java.lang.String currentFile

        • changed

          boolean changed

        • textEventHistory

          TextEventHistory textEventHistory

        • documentEventCapturer

          DocumentEventCapturer documentEventCapturer

        • connector

          Connector connector

        • editor

          DistributedTextEditor editor

        • k1

          java.awt.event.KeyListener k1
          For registering changes to the document

        • Listen

          javax.swing.Action Listen
          When this action is invoked from the menu bar, the editor becomes a server listening for clients on a given port through a ServerConnector. If the port is not specified correctly, a message dialog is shown, informing the user to input a proper port.

        • Connect

          javax.swing.Action Connect
          When this action is invoked from the menu bar, the editor tries to establish a connection through a ClientConnector to a given IP and port. If the port is not specified correctly, a message dialog is shown, informing the user to input a proper port.

        • Disconnect

          javax.swing.Action Disconnect
          When this action is invoked from the menu bar, the editor disconnects from the active connection and goes back to running locally.

        • Save

          javax.swing.Action Save
          When this action is invoked, the document is either saved as a new document, if it is not already saved, or it is saved to the already existing file

        • SaveAs

          javax.swing.Action SaveAs
          Save as a new document

        • Quit

          javax.swing.Action Quit
          Quit the editor after asking to save

        • m

          javax.swing.ActionMap m

        • Copy

          javax.swing.Action Copy
          Action for copying selected text

        • Paste

          javax.swing.Action Paste
          Action for pasting selected text
